snippet: The United Nations Human Rights Council will meet Monday to consider calls for an international inquiry into possible crimes against humanity.

byline.original: By NICK CUMMING-BRUCE and CHOE SANG-HUN
byline.contributor: Choe Sang-Hun reported from Seoul and Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva.

lead_paragraph: The United Nations Human Rights Council will meet Monday to consider calls for an international inquiry into possible crimes against humanity.

headline.seo: North Korea Faces Pressure From U.N. on Human Rights
headline.main: North Korea Faces Pressure From U.N. on Human Rights
headline.print_headline: North Korea Faces Pressure From U.N. on Human Rights

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
